module.name: LDAP Caller ID Lookup
module.description: Allows Caller ID Lookup of incoming calls against different sources (MySQL, HTTP, ENUM, Phonebook Module and LDAP)
module.changelog: *1.3.0.3* Fixed ldapcidlookup.agi and added number format support *1.3.0.2* Added ldap_prefix for short numbers. *1.3.0.1* Fixed ldapcidlookup.agi script *1.3.0.0* Updated Web interface to support LDAP *1.2.1.3* #2172 deprecated use of |, changed categories *1.2.1.3* #2172 deprecated use of |, changed categories *1.2.1.2* bump for rc1 *1.2.1.1* shorten menu name *1.2.1* changed freePBX to FreePBX *1.2.0* Added SQLite3 support, fixes ticket:1796 (FreePBX 2.3 only) *1.1.1* Add he_IL translation *1.1* First release for FreePBX 2.2 - Fixed compatibility issue with new UI *1.0.4* Updated module.xml format *1.0.3* Fixes from #999 *1.0.1* Added possibility to cache in astDB Added lookup from cache before querying external source *1.0.0* First release
